fields.description:
When I want to build directly to a device and I forget to plug it in or for some reason it is not connected well I get:

{code}
Which device do you want to install your app on?
   1)  iTunes Sync
Select an device by number or name [1]: 
{code}

I would like an option to rescan so that I can just plugin my device and use that option instead of having to cancel and restart the command.

For example:

{code}
Which device do you want to install your app on?
   0)  Rescan for devices
   1)  iTunes Sync
Select an device by number or name [0]: 
{code}
fields.summary: CLI: Add option to rescan for devices to install to

comments.body: Moving this improvement request to engineering for further evaluation and prioritization.
